website_summaries.verdict: Feel great throughout the day as well as throughout the years.
pros: Helps relieve fatigue and improves stamina year after year
Reports of increased performance all around
Loyal customers swear by this supplement
cons: Side effects may include increased food cravings

customer_reviews.title: Great natural option! 💪
customer_reviews.text: Husband likes this. Effective and he noticed increased muscular definition and hardness. However, after 3 months, body acclimated and needed to cycle off for several months. Back on and seeing results again. Great natural option!
customer_reviews.author: FaithFuelFitness

customer_reviews.title: Oh Brother!
customer_reviews.text: When will I learn my lesson? None of these natural test boosters work worth a darn. I keep thinking some day I'll find the Holy Grail of test boosters. This wasn't it. King Arthur would have had my head if I returned from my quest for the grail and brought him this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: joe aversano

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement but less pills would be better
customer_reviews.text: Good supplement and I will give 5 stars when the manufacture make it available in VEGGIE SOFTGELS 1 or 2 per day max
customer_reviews.author: God'sCuty

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my T up!!
customer_reviews.text: This formula is great for keeping me feeling great. I used to take it and I just sorta stopped for a while and really felt my T slipping again. So, I order myself a bottle a few weeks ago and I can already tell a difference. Great to take 3 before sex too!!
customer_reviews.author: Berto Pridello

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: has helped hubby tremendously getting another shipment today!! He says he feels great while on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. G

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Lasting Results
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, been using it for a couple of years. Even if you run out for a couple of days, effects seem to last. Amazon processed quickly, but can'tsay much for Ontrac's delivery, which was just thrown over our front fence onto the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best herbal mixture for the aging male. Your partner will thank you for using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it does anything
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it is doing anything. I will continue to use it until it is gone but I will most likely not order it again
customer_reviews.author: Lit'lBro

customer_reviews.title: Helps to control visceral fat
customer_reviews.text: Since using this product with “appropriate diet and real exercise “ my central obesity has decreased. Weight loss has been 10 lbs in 3 weeks. I am only taking 1/2 of recommended dose to achieve these results.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M. Salik

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t notice a significant difference in my energy level after 3 months of continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Wonderful

customer_reviews.title: do not work for me....
customer_reviews.text: too for one month no boost in energy...plus they make your pits stink....

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition for a healthy living ACTIVE male!
customer_reviews.text: All natural; healthy T-boost! Take as recommended with your healthy diet and exercise and you will NOT be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are pleased with the results of these. He is on his second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Been taking on and off all year and for me it does as advertised, helps with energy and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Emeka Okammor

customer_reviews.title: Gives You a Good Boost
customer_reviews.text: This stuff certainly boosts your metabolism and testosterone levels. It could be a good way for men (25+) to jumpstart weight loss or a healthier lifestyle. It made me crave meat and dairy like crazy. The only drawback I could think of is that it didn't seem to boost my libido but that may have just been a me thing.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Makes my bone turn to stone. Also noticed more ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes my bone turn to stone. Also noticed more sensitivity. I am a healthy 31 year old male without any potency problems. I purchased this because some of the ingredients are said to improve overall circulation which I have problems with. I'm also enjoying the extra benefits.. if you know what I mean. Turned out to be a very safe n' mild way to add a little tickle in your pickle.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Great to pair with your pre workout supplement
customer_reviews.text: This helps to give me that extra pump I need when I workout. I would take this with another pre workout supplement and I would have intense training session.
customer_reviews.author: Luis I. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: After selling and trying several products over the years, lifeseasons provides some of my favorite supplements. Masculini-T is great for someone on a regular basis, but taking two or three before sex: that is fun too.
customer_reviews.author: Dar

customer_reviews.title: All i have to say is WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 44 years old & I Bought my first bottle a month ago & have been taking it 3 times a day. I mainly bought this product for better performance at the gym & it has worked way better than i expected. With proper eating habits I have been lifting more weight & my endurance is through the roof. Not to mention my wife is also getting benefits. Bottom line is this is an AWESOME product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LifeSeasons Masculini-T Testosterone Support product seems to be working well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves it!! (wink, wink, nudge, nudge, say no more)

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product but you don't have it on Prime
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product but you don't have it on Prime. It's making me so mad I'm making this review. Making me wait longer than necessary is not necessary. The other Lifeseasons products are on prime. I don't get it.

customer_reviews.title: Energy
customer_reviews.text: It works as described. I would recommend to all who need a supplemental Boost.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t give up until you finish the first bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 64, I used different products in the past,didn’t notice any improvements. Two months ago I purchased a bottle at Whole Foods, I’m on my second bottle. For me I only notice results at the end of the first bottle, I will continue using it. Best I’ve used so far.
customer_reviews.author: Fletch

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using for a couple months,couldn't find it locally due to panic buying I think, noticed fatigue, low energy and stamina, was able to get a new bottle at the local health food store, took two capsules a couple hours after a meal and noticed a major increase in energy, this stuff works great!
customer_reviews.author: steve sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Active lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: Im a 26 year old male. For a year now Ive been living an active lifestyle. From grappling, Kickboxing, long distance biking, Soccer, and hitting the gym, and I also work full time at a grocerystore. I noticed great benefits from this supplements after a month. Its worth it. Im on my second bottle now and cant wait to see the positive changes to come.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: Working, for now
customer_reviews.text: I just got this 3 days ago and am already noticing my libido improving. Had my first sex dream in a while last night and woke up with an erection for the first time in years. 50 yrs old. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Scotty B

customer_reviews.title: Undesired side effect
customer_reviews.text: The product caused a skin rash. The rash started within 3 days of commencing use and stopped the same day of discontinuing use. I saw no benefit from the product.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Best natural product better then anything else out there!
customer_reviews.text: This product has 100% helped me lift more at the gym. Been lifting for years now and never have I lifted as much weight since starting this product. Couldn't be more happier. My friend sell this product and wanted me to try it and I couldn't be happier. I would recommend it to anyone I knew looking for a natural boost.

customer_reviews.title: POWER UP!!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like GOKU when he takes his sensu beans!! Power up!!!

customer_reviews.title: Boosts My libido
customer_reviews.text: Used this product over 3 years helps me with my libedio and energy . Works glad to be able to,purchase it at a lower price online

customer_reviews.title: Men's Recharge
customer_reviews.text: After he reluctantly took it, we notice it helps my husband's mood/energy/motivation... Amazing what an impact testosterone levels can have on a guy! Try this out for sure if your guy is cranky and tired.

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Older men need. More blood flow to have sexual results this product do no provide that .

product_meta.title: LifeSeasons - Masculini-T - Testosterone Support for Men - Supplement for Healthy Male Stamina, and Energy - with Ginkgo, Ginseng - 180 Capsules
product_meta.description:
Size:Value Size - 180 CapsulesRely on our Masculini-T for your natural testosterone support supplement needs. Our natural ingredients are clinically-tested to support men’s health and crafted to help improve mental and physical health in men. Common results including feeling extra energy and sexual health in just a few days. Continue using this testosterone support supplement for two months to see optimal results. Combining herbs like Maca, Longjax, Fenugreek Seed, Muira Puama, Tribulus, and Horny Goat Weed, Masculini-T supports your male health needs, naturally. 

Simply take one capsule three times a day to support your energy and physical and mental health. 

At LifeSeasons, we are dedicated to creating safe and effective supplements that support your well-being through the power of plants. 

Everyone is different, and results will vary from person to person. The key is to maintain consistent use every day to see best results. 

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: Helps Male Stamina: Masculini-T, a testosterone support supplement, is crafted to help improve athletic and sexual health in men by supporting testosterone levels. Common results like extra energy and drive can be felt in a few days with prime results after two months.
High-Quality Testosterone Support: Masculini-T's formula relies on clinically-tested, high-quality ingredients curated to support healthy testosterone levels.
Natural Ingredients: Created with herbs like Maca, Longjax, Fenugreek Seed, Muira Puama, Tribulus, and Horny Goat Weed to help your energy and health.
Healthy Testosterone Support: Take one capsule three times throughout the day to ensure optimal results with our natural testosterone support supplement.

Nature Works. Science Proves It: LifeSeasons creates natural, safe and effective health supplements to help you feel your best. We utilize both the wisdom of nature and the progress of science in our targeted, high-quality formulas.
